We hope to learn from the recorder what the Valiant was doing
here and what destroyed the vessel.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
We'll move out into our probe as
soon as we have those answers.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: The old impulse engines weren't strong enough.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Doctor Dehner, how are you on ESP?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: I'm asking what you know about ESP.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: That's probably the best argument to continue the probe.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Other
vessels will be heading out here someday and they'll have to know what
they'll be facing.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: We're leaving the galaxy, Mister Mitchell.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Helmsmen, take us out of here.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
(Dehner gets hit by an electric
charge, then Mitchell) Helmsmen!

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: (Spock takes over, Enterprise veers away) Take damage reports.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: And you, are you feeling all right?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
You mentioned that tests show you have a high degree of
extrasensory perception.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: So do the records of the others.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Gary Mitchell
has the highest esper rating of all.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Do we know for sure, Doctor, that there isn't another kind?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: I've been worried about you ever since that night on Deneb IV.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: I wasn't that bad, was I?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
I'm going to ask Doctor Dehner to keep you under observation for
a while.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Put a twenty four hour watch on the Sickbay.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Fullest possible
range of examinations and tests.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
It is my duty, whether pleasant or unpleasant, to listen to the
reports, observations, even speculations, on any subject that might
affect the safety of this vessel, and it's my science officer's duty to
see I'm provided with that.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Mister Scott, would you repeat what you just told us?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Has he shown abilities of such magnitude?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: And you didn't think it worth mentioning?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: There'll be no discussion of this with the crew.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: I need a recommendation, Spock, not vague warnings.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: We'll be trapped in orbit there.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
We haven't
enough power to blast back out.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: If you mean strand Mitchell there, I won't do it.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: There's not a soul on the whole planet.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Even the ore
ships call only once every twenty years.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Will you try for one moment to feel?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
At least act like you've got
a heart.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Are you reading all our thoughts, Gary?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: What would you do in my place?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: I want him unconscious for a while.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Could they be detonated from here?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
I want only one medical officer
here at any one time.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
The other will monitor him on the dispensary
screen.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: You've been testing your ability to take over the Enterprise.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
In
the transporter room, you said something about us
seeming like insects by comparison, squashing us if we got in your way.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
In the Sickbay, you said if you were in my place, you'd kill
a mutant like yourself.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: His eyes went back to normal.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: I didn't order any (Spock enters with rifle) Affirmative.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Doctor Dehner feels he isn't that dangerous.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
What makes you right
and a trained psychiatrist wrong?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
If Mitchell gets out, at your discretion, Lee, if sitting here,
you think you're the last chance, I want you to hit that button.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Have Doctor Piper meet us in the control room with Kelso.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Kelso will be on the destruct button until the last minute.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: You're leaving with the ship, Doctor.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: I gave you an order, Doctor.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Don't give him a pill until after I'm gone.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
It's my fault
Mitchell got as far as he did.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
When Mister Spock recovers, you'll both transport up immediately
to the Enterprise.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
If you have not received a signal from me within twelve hours,
you'll proceed at maximum warp to the nearest Earth base
with my recommendation that this entire planet be subjected to a lethal
concentration of neutron radiation.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: You must help me Before it goes too far.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: At least partly, you are, or you wouldn't be here talking to me.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: What will Mitchell learn in getting there?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Will he know what to
do with his power?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Did you hear him joke about compassion?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Above all else, a god
needs compassion.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Then let's talk about humans, about our frailties.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
As powerful as
he gets, he'll have all that inside him.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
You know the ugly, savage things we
all keep buried, that none of us dare expose.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Be a psychiatrist for one minute
longer.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: What do you see happening to him?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Hang on to being a human for one minute longer.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: A god, but still driven by human frailty.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Do you like what you
see?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: There'll only be one of you in the end.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
if all
this makes a god, or is it making you something else?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Do you like what you see?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
(Dehner zaps Mitchell, he returns fire, she continues and his eyes
return to normal)

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Enterprise from Captain Kirk, come in.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Add to
official losses, Doctor Elizabeth Dehner.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Be it noted she gave her life
in performance of her duty.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Lieutenant Commander Gary Mitchell, same
notation.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: I want his service record to end that way.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
He didn't ask for
what happened to him.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: I believe there's some hope for you after all, Mister Spock.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: It's too small to be a vessel.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
It only
reads about one metre in diameter.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Whatever it is, contact in twelve seconds.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Er, I was on my coffee break.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: I thought I'd check up on

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Well, the main engines are gone, unless we can find some way to
re-energise them.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: I'll, er, I'll get on it right away.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
I just wanted to stop by
and make sure you were okay.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Well, it didn't make any sense that he'd
know, but naturally, I checked out the circuit anyway.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
I don't know
how, but he was right.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
This point is burned out exactly the way he
described it.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Maybe, if we can bypass the fuel bins without blowing ourselves
up.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Transport it up with you, will you?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: I guess I could wire one up right there.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
From here you could blow up this whole
valley.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
The
station seems to be running fine.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: I'm kind of proud of the job we've done.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
We're going to be ready
to transport up (a cable loops over his neck from behind and throttles
him)

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: About an hour ago, the Bridge controls started going crazy.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Levers shifting by themselves, buttons being pushed, instrument
readings changing.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
(having put new panel in a bridge station)
It fits like a glove, Captain.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Oh, did Mister Spock get the phaser
rifle we sent down?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Everything you sent up
seems to be fitting in place.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Yeah, well I figured you weren't on the Bridge.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Kelso's voice
sounded a little nervous.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Well, uh, you finish the game?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
You wanted everybody on the Bridge
before we left the galaxy.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: We're coming up on it fast.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
I'm a little weak for some reason, Jim, but I feel all right
now.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Yeah, she was nova, that one.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Not nearly as many
after-effects this time, except for the eyes.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
They kind of stare back
at me when I'm shaving.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
In a way, I feel better than I've ever felt before in my
life.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: It actually seems to have done me some good.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Well, I'm getting a chance to read some of that longhair
stuff you like.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Hey man, I remember you back at the academy.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
A stack of
books with legs.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
The first thing I ever heard from upperclassmen was,
Watch out for Lieutenant Kirk.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: In his class, you either think or sink.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: If I hadn't aimed that little blonde lab technician at you

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Well, you wanted me to think, didn't you?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
I outlined her
whole campaign for her.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: You better be good to me.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: I'm getting even better ideas here.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Once you get into him, he's rather simple though.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: I don't agree with him at all.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: I'm trying to tell you I feel fine.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
When do I go back on
duty?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
With almost a hundred women onboard, you can do better than
that, friend Captain.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Didn't I say you'd better be
good to me?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: I've got nothing against you, Doctor.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
You know, everybody, everybody seems worried that I don't
have some kind of fever or something.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Maybe if we could just change
these dials (sends them soaring).

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Now back to normal, I think.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
I'm not sure, I, I just thought of making it happen, and it
does.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: It's, hey, er hey watch this, Doc.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
You, you know, Doc, there have been other
things too, like going halfway through the ship's library
in hardly a day.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Slender, feathered things with grace in
upswept curve and tapered tip.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
The Nightingale Woman,
written by Phineas Tarbolde on the Canopius planet back in 1996.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
It's
funny you picked that one, Doctor.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
That's one of the most passionate love sonnets of the past
couple of centuries.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: So, er, so, how go the repairs?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: You'd better check the starboard impulse packs.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Those points
have about decayed to lead.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
You activate those packs, and you'll
blow the whole impulse deck.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
He'd seen those points and he hadn't
noticed their condition.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: The image of what he'd seen was still in his mind.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
(cup slides under tap, is
filled, then flies through the air to his hand) It's like a man who has
been blind all of his life, suddenly being given sight.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Sometimes I
feel there's nothing I couldn't do, in time.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Some people think that
makes me a monster, don't they Jim.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: I can sense mainly worry in you, Jim.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Probably just what Mister Spock is thinking now.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: I also know we're orbiting Delta Vega, Jim.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
I can't let you
force me down there.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: I may not want to leave this ship, not yet.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
I'm not sure yet just what kind of a world I can
use.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
I don't understand it all yet, but if I keep growing, getting
stronger, why, the things I could do, like, like maybe a god could do.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Soon I'll squash you like
insects.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
remember those rodent things on
Dimorus?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: I took one meant for you.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: So why be afraid of me now?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Why don't you kill me then?

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Mister Spock is right and you're
a fool if you can't see it.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Man cannot survive if a race of true espers is born.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: You should have killed me while you could, James.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Command and
compassion is a fool's mixture.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
(zaps Kirk and Spock then waves away
the forcefield.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
He leads Dehner into his cell and we see in the mirror
her eyes are like his now)

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
(creates and oasis with
flowers and a spring) You'll soon share this feeling, Elizabeth.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
To be
like God, to have the power to make the world anything you want it to
be.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
You'll enjoy being a god,
Elizabeth.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Whenever
we visited that planet, I always favoured these.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
You follow the right path,
James.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text: Go to him, Elizabeth, talk to him.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
Now that you're changing I
want you to see just how unimportant they are.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before

Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
(phaser rifle has no
effect on him) I've been contemplating the death of an old friend.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
He
deserves a decent burial, at least.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
(a grave appears in the rock, with
a tombstone engraved James R Kirk.

ep_title:
Where
No Man Has Gone Before
text:
A massive boulder on the cliff above
is loosened)

ep_title:
Where

In two hours, two hundred more will die, and two hundred more after that until the two Federation spies are turned over to us.
This is the order of Kor.
They know what death is, don't they?
Bad enough to be a military governor, but to govern a population of sheep!
Very well, Lieutenant, round up two hundred more.
Will I have to kill them all?
You have done well to get this far through my guards.
You will be interested in knowing that a Federation fleet is on its way here at the moment.
Our fleet is preparing to meet them.
Shall we wait and see the results before you kill me?
Think of it, as we sit here, in space above us the destiny of the galaxy will be decided for the next ten thousand years.
Can I offer you a drink?
We can toast the victory of the Klingon fleet.
If some day we are defeated, well, war has its fortunes good and bad.
Do you know why we are so strong?
Each of us is part of the greater whole, always under surveillance.
Even a commander like myself, always under surveillance, Captain.
What happens in space is not your business.
You've tried to hem us in, cut off vital supplies, strangle our trade!
And now you step in with some kind of trick.
You are meddling in things that are none of your business.
But is all of this possible?
You do not look like a storekeeper.
Vulcans are members of the Federation.
He is what he claims to be, Commander, a Vulcanian merchant named Spock.
His main concern seems to be how he would carry out his business under our occupation.
A certain amount of apprehension regarding us.
I used force four, which is sufficient to break down any pretence.
The guards, ten of them were constantly on duty watching the cell.
Then when they opened it to give them food, they simply weren't there, and there was no way out.
They do not seem to be worried about anything.
I am to gather two hundred more.

City on the Edge of Forever

text: Now, let's start by getting one thing straight.

text:
If you're a bum, if you can't break off of the booze or
whatever it is that makes you a bad risk, then get out.

ep_title:

City on the Edge of Forever
text:
Now I don't
pretend to tell you how to find happiness and love when every day is
just a struggle to survive, but I do insist that you do survive because
the days and the years ahead are worth living for.

ep_title:

City on the Edge of Forever
text:
One day soon man is
going to be able to harness incredible energies, maybe even the atom.

ep_title:
The
City on the Edge of Forever
text:
Energies that could ultimately hurl us to other worlds in some sort of
spaceship.

ep_title:
The
City on the Edge of Forever
text:
And the men that reach out into space will be able to find
ways to feed the hungry millions of the world and to cure their
diseases.

ep_title:
The
City on the Edge of Forever
text:
They will be able to find a way to give each man hope and a
common future, and those are the days worth living for.

text: I'm very well aware of that, Lieutenant.
Bones, what's your theory about the cause of all this?
But it follows a definite pattern, a systematic progression from planet to planet.
Plot an interception course, Mister Sulu.
Lieutenant Uhura, try to contact that ship.
Denevan ship, this is the USS Enterprise.
One hundred and eighty degrees about.
That Denevan ship headed deliberately into the sun.
Aurelan, this is Jim on the Enterprise.
I'm not interested in your excuses, Lieutenant.
You were right a while back.
My brother Sam lives on Deneva.
That woman sounded like his wife Aurelan.
We're going to beam directly into the capital city.
I'll want a complete transcript of everything that happens down there, Yeoman.
There are almost a million inhabitants of Deneva.
There's more than one hundred thousand in this city alone.
My brother's lab is over there.
Did you hear what they said, Mister Spock?
They tried to brain us with these clubs.
(McCoy sedates her) Aurelan, you're safe now.
You heard my sister-in-law say something about they being here.
There are no harmful life forms reported.
Our sensors didn't pick up anything that didn't belong here.
Take charge of the landing party, Mister Spock.
I want some answers to all this.
You have to tell us what happened, Aurelan, to you and the others.
Aurelan, it's important that you tell us.
(One last scream and convulsion, then all her readings plummet to zero.
You've seen some kind of creature?
Let's go find out what it is.
Set your phasers on force three, to kill.
We're looking for some kind of creature, and we already know it will kill.
And it can bear up under full phaser power.
It may be a trap in here.
Did you operate on Spock in time?
Use phasers on stun if necessary.
Get him back to the Sickbay.
What about the human half of you?
Can he control it the way he says, Bones?
I need you, Spock, but we can't take any chances.
We'll keep you confined for a while longer.
If you can maintain control, we'll see.
If he regains consciousness, will he go through that?
I don't care what it takes or costs.
Mister Spock, I gave you an order to stay in the Sickbay.
Mister Spock, your logic, as usual, is inescapable.
Stay in constant touch with us.
That would answer a lot of questions.
This may be one cell in a larger organism.
An incredibly huge organism, in fact.
Existing so differently from any living matter or energy as we know it, that it may have come here, planet by planet, from an entirely different galaxy.
The Denevan that flew into the sun cried out that he was free, that he'd won.
That's the angle to work on, gentlemen.
I want an analysis of all this from Medical and Life Science departments within the hour.
There has to be something that'll kill the creature without destroying the human host.
We've got fourteen science labs aboard this ship.
The finest equipment and computers in the galaxy.
There's more than two lives at stake here.
I cannot let it spread beyond this colony, even if it means destroying a million people down there.
I will accept neither of those alternatives, gentlemen.
I cannot let this thing expand beyond this planet, nor do I intend to kill a million or more people to stop it.
I'm putting you gentlemen on the hot seat with me.
Something in the sun killed that thing before the Denevan died.
What other qualities or properties does the sun have?
But one other thing you haven't mentioned.
It radiates a blinding light if you're close enough.
But down on the surface, the creatures stayed in the shadows for the most part.
Light, like in a sun, close up.
No, but you can move the equivalent of the sun to Deneva.
Your figures are, of course, accurate.
With the creature exposed to everything we can give it.
But what about the people who are infected?
There's no time for maybes, Bones.
Yes, we'd have to put someone who's infected under that light.
We have to duplicate the conditions on the planet, and Spock
We have to duplicate the brilliance that existed at the moment the Denevan declared himself freed.
Are you telling me that Spock need not have been blinded?
Satellite control, this is the Captain.
Yeoman, record this for Starfleet Command.
The alien creatures on Deneva have been destroyed
Regaining eyesight would be an emotional experience for most.
If you gentlemen are finished, would you mind laying in a course for Starbase Ten, Mister Spock?
You've been so concerned about his Vulcan eyes, Doctor, you forgot about his Vulcan ears.
Ahead warp factor one, Mister Sulu.
I've tried every major transmitting station on Deneva.
None of them have acknowledged my contact signal.
But sir, that's a call sign for a private transmitter.
Captain, I'm having difficulty on that transmitter call to Deneva.
I've made contact with your private transmitter, sir.
I'm afraid that's impossible at the moment, Captain.
They do not acknowledge my contact signal.
Captain, receiving messages from a ground station.
As I speculated, Captain, the overall pattern of mass insanity destroying civilisations follows an almost straight line through this section of the galaxy.
Over here the Beta Portilin system the ancient civilisations.
Archaeologists have given us information indicating that they were the beginning.
Two hundred years ago, Levinius Five was swept by mass insanity, then Theta Cygni Twelve.
The last was Ingraham B, two years ago.
The ship is a one-man vessel of Denevan configuration, Captain.
He does not seem to be out of control.
His course is straight for the sun.
Outer hull temperature now four hundred and eighty degrees and rising.
Hull temperature one thousand degrees and rising.
Hull temperature falling, gravimetric pull approaching tolerance level.
Originally colonised as a freighting-line base in this area.
No Federation contacts for over a year.
Lieutenant Uhura has had no further response to our signals.
Sensors report the expected number of humans on the planet surface.
They seemed most concerned for our safety.
Their attitude was inconsistent with their actions.
Captain, I understand how you must
Apparently they were trying to keep something outside from getting in.
Obviously they were not entirely successful.
I am at a loss to understand it.
The streets are extraordinarily quiet, Captain.
We've seen no other Denevans, and the ones we stunned earlier were gone when we came out.
We were about to investigate it.
Not only should it have been destroyed by our phasers, it does not even register on my tricorder.
It is not life as we know or understand it.
Yet t is obviously alive, it exists.
Captain, I suggest we risk taking it aboard.
These restraints will no longer be necessary.
I'll be able to return to duty.
I apologise for my weakness earlier when I tried to take control of the ship.
Pain is a thing of the mind.
It is proving to be an inconvenience, but it is manageable.
And the creature, with all of its thousands of parts, even now is pressuring me.
(the pain indicator hits the top of the monitor) It wants this ship, but I am resisting.
I have my own will, Captain.
I have an errand on the planet's surface.
You will beam me down to the same co-ordinates as before.
That is an order, Mister Scott.
Until the pain was gone, Captain.
It has been discontinued by me.
One of the creatures will have to be captured and analysed, Captain.
We did not have a clear opportunity to do so earlier when I was attacked.
Since my nervous system is already affected, as you pointed out, Doctor, I don't believe they can do much more to me.
I am in complete control of myself, Doctor.
The fact that I am here proves that I do not belong in bed.
I believe you'll find this interesting.
Doctor, your medical skill and curiosity are quite admirable, but I assure you I'm all right.
A one-celled creature resembling, more than anything else, a huge, individual brain cell.
Do you understand what I'm suggesting, Captain?

And although it is not physically connected to the other cells, it is nevertheless part of the whole creature, guided by the whole, drawing its strength from the whole, which probably accounts for its unusual resistance to our phaser weapons.
From a place where our physical laws do not apply.
We may therefore find it difficult to destroy, Captain.
I regret I see no other choice for you, Captain.
We already know this thing has destroyed three civilisations.
Including myself, Doctor, and Captain Kirk's young nephew.
Understandably upsetting, but once it spreads past here, there are dozens of colonies beyond and billions of people.
I therefore request permission to beam down to the planet's surface.

text:
It surrounds an
independent inner core, which has a breathable atmosphere.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For

text: Then the passengers, or builders, are dead.

ep_title:

The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For

text:
The course Ensign Chekov just gave for the asteroid would put it
on a collision course with Daran Five.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Population approximately three billion and seven
hundred twenty four million, if memory serves me correctly.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Estimated
time of impact three hundred ninety six days.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: One fails to see the logic in making a ship look like a planet.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: The asteroid ship is over ten thousand years old, Doctor.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Still
no sign of life forms, Captain.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
The doctor must have received an excessively large electrical
shock.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Nothing else could've caused this, Captain.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
At least nothing
that has happened here.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: May I ask precisely what is troubling the doctor?

The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
The Captain and I seem to have suffered no
ill effects.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Captain, informing these people they're on a ship may be in
violation of the Prime Directive of Starfleet Command.

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

text: He said it was forbidden to climb the mountains.

The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
The young lady did show a marked preference for
your company.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: We are very interested in your world.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Incredible as it may seem, these people have
no idea they're living on a spaceship.

ep_title:

The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:

The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
If I remember correctly, the oracle's reprehensible
conduct was initiated when Natira knelt on that platform.

ep_title:

The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Nothing here which would indicate this is anything but a planet.

ep_title:

text: There's no question but that the creators would be considered gods.

ep_title:

The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

text:
That is the number in the Fabrina solar
system.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
And no doubt they've been in flight on this asteroid ship for
ten thousand years.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Your decision is most illogical, Doctor.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: I believe it's time to move on.

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For

text:
There are no guards to
detain us.

The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

text:
A very simple problem, easy to
correct.

text:
I believe we can attempt the course
correction, Captain.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

text:
I believe we can allow this ship
to go back to its automatic control.

The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For

text:
Their
banks contain the total knowledge of the Fabrini, ready for the people
to consult
when they arrive at their destination.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
(scans them) And they seem to
have amassed a great deal of medical knowledge.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Your haemoglobin count is back to normal, Doctor, which
indicates that the flow of oxygen to each cell of your body is back up
to its abundantly energetic level.

Let me go to my
friend.

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: I can't say I think much of your welcome.

ep_title:
For

text: They've been in flight ten thousand years.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: I am Captain Kirk of the starship Enterprise.

ep_title:
For

text:
This is my medical
officer, Doctor McCoy.

The shock was serious because of McCoy's
weakened condition.

The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
I don't think he would've told you himself, but I think you
should know now.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Then you know that nothing can be done.

The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Are you in any condition to get up?

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
The people of Yonada may be changed by the knowledge, but
it's better than exterminating them.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: And the three billion on Daran Five.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: No, we're from outside your world.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: For the world is hollow, and I have touched the sky.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Yes, of course it is, because if you did you'd touch the sky and
find out that you were living on a big ball.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Not a planet, but a
spaceship.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: And that knowledge seems to be forbidden.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: He just suddenly screamed in pain and died.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: You seem to be the special favourite.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Personally, I find the lady's taste questionable, but she
obviously prefers you, and you obviously don't seem to mind.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
If you
could arrange to be alone with the young lady, Spock and I would be
left alone to find the power controls of this world.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: To our good friends of Yonada.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Then you wouldn't mind if we looked around?

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: And thank you for taking care of Doctor McCoy.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
I wonder how many generations have lived out their lives and been
buried here without ever knowing that their world is hollow.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Didn't the Fabrini sun go nova and destroy its planets?

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Some of them must have been put aboard this ship and sent to
another planet.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: The Oracle doesn't seem to know we're here.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
I
wonder what alerted it the first time.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
The clue to the
location of the control room must be around here somewhere.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: This plaque is a representation of a star and its solar system.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Then there's no doubt these people are the descendants of the
Fabrini.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
It's a space ship on a collision
course with Daran Five.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Doctor McCoy, I order you to return with us.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Bones, if we can't correct the course of this ship, we'll have to
blast it out of space.

The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: You said something about a book.

The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: You must listen to what I have to say.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Give me
one moment to speak to you.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Natira, if you don't believe
what I'm about to tell you, you can call the guards.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
We'll accept any
punishment you decree.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: You must believe that what I'm about to tell you is the truth.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Yes, my world and your world of Yonada.

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Ten thousand years ago, a sun
was dying and with it, its world.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
It's the world you see on the plaque
in the room of the Oracle.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: It is the world of your ancestors, your creators.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
When your ancestors
discovered that their world was dying they built a great ship and chose
their best people.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: They wished for their race to survive.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
They sent the
ship out into space.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: You are living inside a hollow ball.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Your ancestors created
it to take you on a journey to a promised new planet.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Because a flaw developed in the controls.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
And unless we correct
it, Yonada will kill millions of people and destroy a world it doesn't
even know.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Let us remove the instrument of obedience, the way we did for
McCoy.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Do you think she understood me?

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: We do this for the survival of the people of Yonada.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: We mean no desecration to the faith of Yonada.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
We must consult
the book to help you.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: McCoy, how do you open this thing?

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: The plan must be in there.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Let's get her out of the heat.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Not too different from
the Enterprise.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Enough to turn it off course?

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Steadying on course marked in red.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Doctor McCoy, the Fabrini descendants are scheduled to debark on
their promised planet in approximately three hundred and ninety days.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
I think that we could manage to be in that vicinity at that time, if
you wanted to thank the Fabrini personally.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Aye, and chemically fuelled to boot, sir.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Then it must be on automatic controls.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Course of asteroid, I mean spaceship two four one mark one
seven.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
I am a nurse first, Doctor McCoy, and a
member of the crew of the Enterprise second.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
I've called the Captain and I'll wait
until he comes.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: A lot can happen in a year.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: The white corpuscle count is back to normal.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: You may return to your quarters.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: I said you were excused, Nurse.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
I promise you
I'll give the Captain a full report.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
I've just completed the standard physical examinations for the
entire crew.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: I found nothing unusual, with one exception.

The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
I'll be most effective on the job in the time left, if you'll
keep this to yourself.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: You'd never find your way back.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: You'd swear you were on the surface of a planet.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: You found no intelligent life forms, Mister Spock, but surely

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
These people don't know they're on a
spaceship.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Are you all right, Mister Spock?

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Oh, that Oracle really got to me.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
I must be especially
susceptible to its magic spells.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Well, we'd better get to the control room.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Gentlemen, I believe we have a visitor.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: It tastes like an ancient herb derivative.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
(a red light goes out) He's
dead.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: I'm quite all right, thank you.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Nobody can blame her for that, can they?

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: How did the Oracle punish the old man?

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: There is some way the Oracle knows what you say, isn't there?

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
I suppose we had to learn the power of the
Oracle.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: But we're strangers to each other.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: How long will it take you to reach this new world?

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: If you only knew how I needed some kind of future, Natira.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: There's something I need to tell you.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: I have an illness for which there is no cure.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
I have one year to
live.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: What are you going to do to my friends?

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: They acted out of ignorance, Natira.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Please let them return to the ship.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Natira, what they did, they did because they felt they had to.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Please,
let them return to the ship.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
How do you think I'd
feel if I stayed here with the chance to be happy for the first time in
my life, but knowing my friends had died?

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: I'm on a kind of a collision course myself, Jim.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
I intend to stay on this ship, with these people, whatever
happens.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Natira's asked me to stay,
and I'm staying.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Is that too much to ask, Jim?

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Do the people know the contents of their book?

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Has the reason that the people must leave here been revealed to
you?

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Don't you long to know its secrets?

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: We may be able to get these people back on course.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
No, but I've seen the book that contains all
the knowledge of the creators.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: If you can get to it, Spock

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
The book is in the
monolith.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Press the three lower planets on the left-hand side
simultaneously.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: We'll be all right here now, Jim.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: The oracle can no longer punish us.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: You intend to stay here, on Yonada?

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Now more than ever, I wish to search through the universe to
find a cure for myself and others like me.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
And I want you to be with
me.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Thank you, Mister Spock, for bringing back the knowledge of the
Fabrini.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: I am Natira, the high priestess of the people.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Welcome to the
world of Yonada.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Oh, Oracle of the people, most perfect and wise.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Strangers have
come to our world.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: They bear instruments we do not understand.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: For what reason do you visit this world?

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
(kneels and prays) Forgive him for
he was an old man, and old men are sometimes foolish.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
But it is written
that those of the people who sin or speak evil shall be punished.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: (guards arrive) He served well for many years.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
It is the will of the Oracle that you now be treated as
honoured guests.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: It is time to refresh yourselves.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: The people know of you now.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
(to McCoy) Are you well
enough to go about?

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: You are free to go about and meet our people.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: What we say, what we think.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
The Oracle knows the minds and the
hearts of all the people.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: I did not know you would be hurt so badly.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: McCoy, there is something I must say.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
It is
not in the manner of the people to hide their feelings.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Is there a woman for you?

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
I hope you men of space, of other worlds, hold truth as dear as
we do.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: I wish you to stay here on Yonada as my mate.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: But is not that the nature of men and women?

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
That the pleasure
is in the learning of each other?

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Let the thought rest in your heart, McCoy.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
The people, in the fullness of time, will
reach a new world.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Rich, green, lovely to the eyes, and of a goodness
that will fill the hearts of the people with tears of joy.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
You can
share that world with me, rule it by my side.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: The Oracle will only say soon.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: You have lived a lonely life?

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: There will be no more loneliness for you.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: There is nothing you need to say.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Then tell me, if the telling is such a need.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Until I saw you, there was nothing in my heart.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
It sustained my
life, but nothing more.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
I could be happy to have that
feeling for a day, a week, a month, a year.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Whatever the creators hold
in store for us.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
It is written only the high priestess of the people may select
her mate.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: The strangers among us, the three visitors.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: I wish him to remain here as my mate.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: He has not yet given me his answer.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: He will be told what must be done.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: It will be done, o most wise.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Two of the strangers, Kirk and Spock.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
(guards run in) When the oracle releases them, take
them.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
You think you can do as you
please, commit whatever offence amuses you?

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: I can make no other decision.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
We gave them our trust, they
betrayed us.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: They said they came in friendship.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: This I will do for McCoy.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Say now, because once done, it is done.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: You are now one with my people.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
(she kneels beside him) May I
give you the love you want, and make the time you have beautiful.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: It is done, O most wise.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Our living link with the creators.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
This is the Book of the People, to be opened and read when we
reach the new world of the promise.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: It was given by the creators.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
Only that it tells of our world here and why soon, one day, we
must leave it for the new world.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
It is enough for me to know that we shall understand all
when we reach our home.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: You are killers of your friend.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: I will have you put to death.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: Until you are dead, he will think of you and disobey!

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: (in tears) He is not part of our people.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text:
You've released him
from his vow of obedience.

ep_title:
For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky

For
The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
text: You will never see the book.
